lead_paragraph: Ryan Held couldn't sing along to the U.S. national anthem with his teammates. He was too overcome with emotion on the top spot of the medal podium.

headline.main: Oh Say Can You Sob: US Swimmers Get Emotional at Rio Games
headline.print_headline: Oh Say Can You Sob: US Swimmers Get Emotional at Rio Games

snippet: Ryan Held couldn't sing along to the U.S. national anthem with his teammates. He was too overcome with emotion on the top spot of the medal podium....
